entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Local blowing snow early this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Clearing. Low minus 19.
